title: 428 Parkway Dr NE
description: This apartment is located in the Old Fourth Ward neighborhood of Atlanta. It offers a convenient location and a range of amenities. The apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, with a size of 950 sqft. It is pet-friendly and has open parking. The cooling is provided by an A/C unit. Utilities are included. The apartment has been listed for rent since Jul 19, 2023.

rentalDetails.rentalAgreement: Contact the manager for rental agreement details.
